resources.string:
Mullah Nasruddin Android application has the complete collection of Mullah Nasruddin jokes in Pashto, Farsi and English language. The Pashto and Farsi jokes are in native script and aligned from right to left. The application also has favorite feature to add joke(s) to favorite list and access it instantly when looking for it again. Our team also made it easy for users to easily share jokes through text messaging or sharing on Social Network. The application comes with large number of styles (themes) to select for entire application. 

We are committed to having frequent upgrades from now on to the application. We highly value our users' input in this regard. Should you have any suggestions or material that can add to the value to the application, please contact us via email or phone: 

Visit our website revittechnology.com 
Email us: info@revittechnology.com 
Ph: +1-416-854-1324 

Note: The application is open source and available on github.com, search for "Mullah Nasruddin" on github.com.
